name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Braze In-App & Landing Page RTL Support

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds RTL (Right-to-Left) support to Braze's in-app message & landing page editor, enabling content creation in RTL languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add RTL support to Braze's in-app message & landing page editor.
Suited for Hebrew, Arabic and Persian languages

Using this extension allows you to write LTR and RTL sentences properly.
